content: crochet xmas tree holiday hat© by donna payne skill level intermediate to advanced stitch count is in multiples of 6 this pattern can be adapted for size based on the stitch count and/or hook size and/or yarn weight size pattern is written in adult size for the following materials yarn - 3 colors or more - size 4 worsted weight acrylic yarn shade of brown for ribbing/hat band any tree shade one shade or more for puff ornaments crochet hook size - h - 5 0 mm darning/sewing needle big enough for yarn scissor stitch markers for adult lg use size i hook 5 5 mm stitches and stitch abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 2 together double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 decrease half_double_crochet 2 together ps -puff - yarn over insert hook into stitch and pull up a loop 5 times yarn over and pull through all loops on hook close puff with slip_stitch v_stitch - 2 double_crochet in each stitch cs - crocodile stitch 5 double_crochet down first post of v_stitch chain 2 5 double_crochet up 2nd post of v_stitch mcs - modified crocodile stitch - 5 half_double_crochet down first post of v_stitch chain 2 5 half_double_crochet up 2nd post of v_stitch v_stitch decrease - chain 1 turn - 1 double_crochet in center half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next puff chain 2 1 double_crochet in center half_double_crochet of next group 1 double_crochet in next puff referenced as a v_stitch at stitch count blo - back loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain rs - right side ws - wrong side round - round skip - skip note do not turn row and rounds unless instructed all rounds are worked on rs with the exception of half_double_crochet/puff rounds which are worked on ws and color 3 is carried throughout the round under stitches note in half_double_crochet/puff row it will look like there are 2 stitches of color 3 at top of puff only one of those stitches is an actual stitch use the loop on top of puff as the main stitch skip over the other puff stitches are always closed with main tree body color changing back to main color note decrease row are on v_stitch row v_stitch decreases will be wider v-stitches but will come together evenly as you continue with your rounds the single_crochet rounds will bring it all together as long as you single_crochet evenly over the decreases ribbing/hat band foundation row - with color 1 brown chain 11 row 1 - skip first chain single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain to end of chain chain 1 turn - 10 single_crochet row 2 - single_crochet in blo in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn - 10 single_crochet row 3 through 66 - repeat row 2 hold ends together taking care not to twist the band slip_stitch row 66 to beginning chain row turn band right side out working along edge of row chain 1 - single_crochet in each row
